topics.body:
Hearing little kids talk about religion creeps me out.
Like, even if they're atheists and talking about it, it unsettles me. It seems like something they're too young to even try to internalize

topics.body:
"wow, so, just watched this on the importance of intelligence":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jdnecUl4jYA

and go down to read the comments saying "oh, that last guy was a dick"

like i understand people sympathize and side with karl as he's a very easy person to like, but the whole point of the video was to try and comprehend what the supposed intelligent people were saying

karl knew that, in fact he understood that the last guy on the film was saying what he did to help move his point

rather impressive how much these people utterly lack the cohesion required for the film, as that's usually something i struggle with and understood his points clearly

there's something very meta about all of this

topics.body:
okay this is just flat out ridiculous

so i can't sleep because i keep having these thoughts and in the most recent one [spoiler]i'm tiny and walking into the maw of a horse because fuck it i'm going to sleep, get swallowed and dont care because fuck it i'm going to sleep, then get swallowed by a tape worm and fuck it i'm going to sleep

so the tape worm spits me out and it's shown that the entirety of the bipedal pony was eaten out so there's a zoom out where the pony falls over dead and i kick the eyeball out and walk out because fuck it i'm going to sleep[/spoiler]

then i got on here to tell you all of my wonderful subconscious, who thinks that shit like this is better than sleeping

fuckitfuckitfuckit it's going to take all of my will but i'm sleeping now
